dublinCore.title: 113 HR 2573 IH: Student Loan Opportunity Act of 2013
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Flores (for himself and Mr. Cuellar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow qualified scholarship funding corporations to access tax-exempt financing for alternative private student loans.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Student Loan Opportunity Act of 2013 .

section.header: Qualified scholarship funding corporation tax-exempt financing for alternative private student loans

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 150(d) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking established and and incurred under the Higher Education Act of 1965 in subparagraph (A) thereof.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to bonds issued after the date of enactment of this Act.
